channel.title: Using boxbreaker and other add ons with scripts
channel.description: how do you use boxbreaker and other add on (antirandoms) to scripts? that require them

item.title: Using boxbreaker and other add ons with scripts
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

its quite simple bob, look at the code bellow

{.include SSi2.txt}

this is bassivly telling scar to include the file “ssi2” here are some more examples

{.include boxbreaker.txt}
{.include RedXIIsFordCracker.txt}
{.include squig.txt}

Read full topic
item.source: Using boxbreaker and other add ons with scripts
